page.title: 20Recreation in Haltwhistle.
page.content: Scott's dad plays{football}for Haltwhistle Crown Paints A team. He scored 30 goals last year. They finished fourth in the Northern Alliance League. Haltwhistle{cricket}team is in the West Tyne League. It plays teams from all over Tynedale. There is a knockout competition and Haltwhistle won it this year. Once they were in a television play. Karen's dad and some more men keep {racing pigeons}in lofts near the bypass. He has 50 birds. Last week his birds flew back from France. Jeanette's dad goes{fishing}in the South Tyne. They catch salmon, trout and sea trout. The information in this part of the survey was collected by the six and seven year olds of Haltwhistle County First School.
